description.value: Certain magics in the world flow easily through your sap. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Barkskin]{Barkskin} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tree Shape]{Tree Shape} as 2nd-level arcane innate spells once per day each. A tree shape spell you cast this way transforms you into a Large flowering plant like a rosebush or lilac bush instead of a tree.
